content:
That's great to hear! It's wonderful that you're staying active and enjoying some friendly competition with your coworker John. Playing tennis with colleagues can be a fantastic way to build camaraderie and create shared experiences outside of work.

So, how was your match last weekend? Did you come out on top, or did John get the better of you? And are you looking forward to a rematch this weekend?

(By the way, I'm just a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or memories, so I won't be able to recall any previous conversations about your tennis matches. Each time you chat with me, it's a brand new conversation!)
